body.title: Basic example
body.elms:
{: .-prime}

```bash
# syncing folder src into dest:
rsync -avz ./src /dest
# syncing the content of src into dest:
rsync -avz ./src/ /dest
```

body.title: Transfer options
body.elms:
```bash
-z, --compress
-n, --dry-run
    --partial   # allows resuming of aborted syncs
    --bwlimit=RATE    # limit socket I/O bandwidth
```

body.title: Skipping options
body.elms:
```bash
-u, --update     # skip files newer on dest
-c, --checksum   # skip based on checksum, not mod-time & size
```

body.title: Include options
body.elms:
```bash
--exclude=PATTERN
--include=PATTERN
```

```bash
--exclude-from=FILE
--include-from=FILE
--files-from=FILE    # read list of filenames from FILE
```

```bash
-C, --cvs-exclude    # exclude from local/global .cvsignore
```

body.title: Archive options
body.elms:
```bash
-a, --archive    # archive (-rlptgoD)
```

```bash
-r, --recursive
-l, --links      # copy symlinks as links
-p, --perms      # preserve permissions
-t, --times      # preserve times
-g, --group      # preserve group
-o, --owner      # preserve owner
-D               # same as --devices --specials
```

```bash
--delete         # Delete extra files
```
